content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment, Maria. I am happy to discuss the rental price with you. However, I would like to clarify that the apartment is quite small, only 25 square meters. That being said, I am open to discussing a fair rental price that will benefit both of us. What do you think would be a reasonable rental price for this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. Can you offer me a price?

TERMINATE
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: I understand that you are looking for the lowest possible rental price. However, as a landlord, I need to consider my own expenses and the value of the apartment in order to set a rental price. Based on my calculations, I would be willing to rent the apartment to you for a price of 500 Euros per month. I believe this is a fair and reasonable rental price for the size and location of the apartment. Is this within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I can accept 500 Euros per month as the rental price. Thank you very much, Mister Heine.

I agree to the price of 500 Euros per month. Thank you for your offer.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: You're welcome, Maria. I'm glad that we were able to come to an agreement on the rental price. I hope you enjoy living in Mannheim and that the apartment meets your needs. If you have any questions or concerns in the future, please don't hesitate to let me know.
name: Heinrich Heine
